Change Log #

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. See Conventional Commits for commit guidelines.

2.86.0 (2024-07-23) #

Bug Fixes #

  • Add missing css for sankeyGraph (c518a48)
  • Bump @hpcc-js/wasm to latest (0c60208)
  • Event.path is non-standard (4edabd5)
  • Graph regression (missing graphlib in bundle) (6b9c98b)
  • graph2/subgraphs failing gallery test (b3db326)
  • Include custom fonts in DownloadPNG (74488ef), closes #3728
  • Workunit.clone() fails. (b0e5c60), closes #3829
  • Add graph2 dblclick annotation support (a5b3d6b)
  • Add guard against unknown event source (5c61240), closes #4061
  • build: @hpcc-js/wasm out of sync (585bc38)
  • build: Remove duplicate d3 packages from bundles (b379f82)
  • build: Source map reference missing in index.min.js (bf3bb07)
  • build: Source maps not referencing TS files (08c3cf3)
  • comms: Workunit details should include formatted properties (5e132f6)
  • comms: rejectUnauthorized does nothing in NodeJS (38f793d)
  • d3-event: d3-event is a global instance. (92760ad)
  • Dashy: DataGraph not clearing on new selection. (0aed76b)
  • Dashy: Filter invalid edges (a2d4a6b)
  • Ensure all widgets can be re-targeted (d1f02c2)
  • faChar: Move font-family into "style" (7ffa6c0)
  • graph: Bump WASM version (c659cd5)
  • graph: Check if hasAttribute exists before calling it (4829ee8)
  • graph: Fix failing tests (0500277)
  • graph: Regression in previous PR (02008b6)

  • graph2: Ctrl+Click should multi select (9c8b8bd), closes #3762
  • graph2: Layout not triggered on option change (c9a42fe), closes #3722

  • Graph: Dragging Vertex causes it to snap to mouse position (b064030), closes #2931

  • graph: Subgraph text can reach beyond edge of border. (c8db668)
  • GraphT: Merge edges fails when ID matches, but source/target has changed (b822ade)
  • graph: Updated Graph2.md (408ade5)
  • graph: Use Vertex.pos as starting position (bf93070), closes #2928
  • graph: WASM runtime out of sync with web worker (bb2e5be)
  • IE11: d3-force >= v2 is not IE11 compatible (0d254fa)
  • MiniGantt click event was non standard (988012a)
